workflows.creator: 5fded9ad-cf9a-43e3-9b08-28bde8b87d6e
workflows.title: On NS Contact created/updated, create/update SF Contact
workflows.description: Transfer information from NS Customer+Contact to SF Account+Contact

boolean-condition-2.title: Has something changed?
boolean-condition-2.description: We need to update the object only if there are changes. This is needed to prevent circular updates between NS and SF.

message.value: Contact NetSuite Id is set to {$.steps.trigger.contactId}.

boolean-condition-4.title: Has something changed?
boolean-condition-4.description: We need to update the object only if there are changes. This is needed to prevent circular updates between NS and SF.

delay-1.title: Delay
delay-1.description: Delay for the SF->NS flow to complete. Otherwise it's recursive update.

dependencies.name: Check if Sync is Enabled for the Object
